fact: Ancient Egyptions used this plant in mummifcication processes.
Their name originates from 'mouse's ear' due to the shape of the petals.
Vanilla flavouring comes from a  type of orchid!
Some of these plants are strong enough to support a small child!
Their leaves are covered in tiny hairs to reflect sunlight and reduce water loss.
The largest of this species can grow up to 3 foot tall and 3 foot wide.
